description: The Logitech Revue Companion Box brings together everything you love - TV, web, apps, and more - to the best screen in your home, your HDTV. Powered by Google TV and Android 3.1, the Logitech Revue companion box and keyboard controller make it simple and seamless to watch TV, surf the web, download apps from the Android Market, and make video calls. The easy-to-use companion box is equipped with the latest audio, video, and Internet connectivity to turn your television into the TV of the future with a wide variety of apps created just for you, including Netflix, NBA TV, Pandora, and more.
title: Logitech Revue Companion Box and Keyboard Controller
